questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates explore an island shaped like a drum and encounter a reindeer doctor. What is...?
Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Big Mom Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate candy. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
